commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list create
commands.summary: Create a DNS resolver domain list.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver domain-list create --dns-resolver-domain-list-name
                                   --domains
                                   --resource-group
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--if-none-match]
                                   [--location]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver domain-list create --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --dns-resolver-domain-list-name sampleDnsResolverDomainList --location westus2 --tags "{key1:value1}" --domains "[contoso.com]"

commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list delete
commands.summary: Delete a DNS resolver domain list. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver domain-list delete [--dns-resolver-domain-list-name]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--yes]
examples: az dns-resolver domain-list delete --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --dns-resolver-domain-list-name sampleDnsResolverDomainList

commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list list
commands.summary: List DNS resolver domain lists in all resource groups of a subscription.

commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list show
commands.summary: Get properties of a DNS resolver domain list.
examples: az dns-resolver domain-list show --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --dns-resolver-domain-list-name sampleDnsResolverDomainList

commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list update
commands.summary: Update a DNS resolver domain list.
commands.syntax:
az dns-resolver domain-list update [--add]
                                   [--dns-resolver-domain-list-name]
                                   [--domains]
                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--if-none-match]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--remove]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--set]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--tags]
examples: az dns-resolver domain-list update --resource-group sampleResourceGroup --dns-resolver-domain-list-name sampleDnsResolverDomainList --location westus2 --tags "{key1:value1}" --domains "[contoso.com]"

commands.name: az dns-resolver domain-list wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
